name: Linda Mar
description: Forgiving beach break perfect for beginners. Crowded but consistent. Protected valley location creates offshore winds.
seasonal_info: Best September-May. Can be cranking in winter when rest of coast is blown out.

name: Linda Mar North
description: Northern section of Linda Mar. Less crowded with slightly better shape when conditions align.
seasonal_info: Great spot for beginner to intermediate-advanced when optimal conditions align.

name: Rockaway
description: Rocky cove with powerful right-hand break and beach breaks. Deep channel allows access on big days. Heavier waves than Linda Mar.
seasonal_info: Year-round but shines on big winter NW swells. Can get quite busy when surf is up. Watch for rips, rocks, and strong currents.

name: Montara
description: Powerful beach break that can produce barrels. Less crowded but more challenging. Heavy waves.
seasonal_info: Best on solid NW swells. Can be dangerous - pounding surf on big days.

name: Princeton Jetty
description: Jetty creates defined peaks with wind protection. More preference for south swell than Linda Mar.
seasonal_info: Year-round spot. Protected from NW winds. Deep channel for easy paddle out.

name: Davenport
description: World-class reef break. Extremely dangerous access down cliffs. Powerful hollow waves for experts only.
seasonal_info: Big winter NW swells only. Treacherous access and powerful waves. Shark presence.

name: Waddell Creek
description: Consistent beach break with longer rides. Good for intermediate surfers. Scenic location.
seasonal_info: Year-round surf. Protected from strong NW winds by point.

name: Fort Point
description: Iconic SF break under Golden Gate Bridge. Cold water, fast powerful waves. Historic location.
seasonal_info: Big winter NW swells. Very cold water year-round. Strong currents.

name: Pleasure Point
description: Famous right-hand point with multiple sections. Sewer Peak, First Peak, Jack's. Very crowded but excellent waves.
seasonal_info: Year-round consistency. Multiple sections offer waves for all abilities. Extremely competitive lineup.

name: The Hook
description: Mellow point break next to Pleasure Point. More beginner-friendly with longer rides.
seasonal_info: Consistent year-round. Good learning spot for point break surfing.

name: South Ocean Beach
description: Heavy, powerful beach break. Big waves, strong currents, dangerous conditions. Advanced surfers only.
seasonal_info: Winter NW swells create massive surf. Extremely challenging conditions with strong rip currents.
